about_the_game: A set of several Holiday themed props which can be used to decorate your space ships!
detailed_description: A set of several Holiday themed props which can be used to decorate your space ships!
legal_notice:

name: Interstellar Rift - Holiday Pack 2020

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4.6 or higher required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD or Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4.6 or higher required

short_description: A free DLC pack containing several new props which can be used to decorate ships for the holiday season!
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
